TopicTitle: [Space Music] Thomas Oliver - If I Move To Mars

Articles.Content:
This video has be released a few days ago and I'm kind of dissapointed that it's only at 10.000 views because it's awesome.

It's Thomas Oliver as an astronaut with a space worthy guitar singing "If I move to Mars".

The whole clip is through the eyes of Thomas Oliver while hes in orbit around Mars.

In before anyone else complains that sound doesn't travel through space

That's cool though. I love the sound FX samples too. I just wish they'd done more with it, but the video was probably already expensive enough.
